TotalIncome.content: Total income: based on your tarrif plan (from 5% to 8% daily)

BasicInterestRate.content: Basic interest rate: +0.4% every 24 hours - only for new deposits

DaysReductionPlan.content: Days reduction plan: Plans length reduces - 0.25 days every day.

RefBonus.content: Ref Bonus: Earn an Additional +0.1% for every 10 users you invite.

MinimalDeposit.content: Minimal deposit: 1 CAKE, no maximal limit

Earning.content: Earning every moment, withdraw any time (if you use capitalization of interest you can only after end of your  deposit)
